"#VMV"-> 3 KEY STEPS

1. #VACCINE for all
2. #MASKS->#N95 for #variants 
3. #VENTILATION-> stale indoor air  carries #covid19 as floating #airborne microparticles (smaller than dust)..#HEPA #airpurifiers help, or cross-ventilate w open windows. -> #schools!
